> "He left Windlord choice his side when we were down there close to
> BlackFortress"replied Talon"He helped them esacpe and now it's a traitor for
> predacons, what's going on with you cheetor? you were more friendly with
> Dinobot than you're doing now "
>
> Perceptor Chuckles she had made a point.

Cheetor shrugged, "Dinobot had to prove himself, no body trusted him
when he first came including big bot." he said, talking about Optimus
Primal. "Remember, he had to show himself to be one of us." Cheetor
looked over at Perceptor and then back at the others, "If you want to
say he is one of us, fine I will go along with it.

Ramulus stood up and walked over to the conversation, his optics on
Perceptor and then Cheetor and then the others, his optics more
distrustful than Cheetor's, but then again Ramulus didn't trust much
of anyone, even some Maximals. "Didn't Nightshift try a similar
trick?" Ramulus said, his voice deep and clear, "He acted like he
escaped from us to fool the Predacons into thinking that he was one of
them?" He gestured over at Perceptor, "How do you know that he is not
doing something similar?"

Ramulus shook his head, "You Maximals, you're all alike, too
trusting." He turned to walk away.

Cheetor on the other hand had his optic open wide as he looked at
Ramulus and then whispered to Talon, "No way I sound like him do I?"
he meant sounding as distrusting as Ramulus did.


(TAG)

Preston
